Si α(T)
Si α(T)
Si α(T)

datasets.kpi_exclusion_reason: Debye+Einstein baseline is retained as a diagnostic stress-test; KPI gating uses the frozen DOS+γ(ω) basis model for this observable.

datasets.dataset: Si α(T) (DOS+γ(ω) basis)

models.dataset: Si α(T) (DOS+γ(ω) basis)
Si α(T) (DOS+γ(ω) basis)

model.name: DOS-constrained Gruneisen gamma(omega) basis (pwlinear_split_leaky; weighted LS) + mode softening (Kim2015 Fig.2 digitized) + B(T) scaling (fit γ) + ridge (factor=1e-06) + pwlinear leak (epsilon=0.24, warp_p=1.32)

excluded_datasets.reason: Debye+Einstein baseline is retained as a diagnostic stress-test; KPI gating uses the frozen DOS+γ(ω) basis model for this observable.

summary.note: This audit catalogs temperature-band sensitivity (procedure/systematic) rather than claiming a universally valid condensed-matter prediction model.
